abstract: As earnings season nears its height, investors looked beyond their concerns about the CIT Group’s possible collapse.
snippet: As earnings season nears its height, investors looked beyond their concerns about the CIT Group’s possible collapse.
lead_paragraph: After dallying for much of the session, the stock market closed higher for a fourth consecutive day on Thursday as investors were encouraged again by strong profits on Wall Street.

headline.main: Shares Rise for a 4th Day as Earnings Stay Strong
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise for a 4th Day As Earnings Stay Strong
